short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block distracting websites and boost your productivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with SiteBlocker, the essential extension designed to help you reclaim your time and boost your productivity. Say goodbye to distractions and hello to focus as you effortlessly block websites that derail your concentration.

(Further updates to user interface to come)
